div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 116 Thessaly ?, c. 1925 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (T) Contents: 27 AE Philip II : 1 Cassander: 14 Atrax: 1 (Rogers 169) Larissa: 2 (R 284) Metropolis: 1 (R 408) Orthe: 1 (R 421) Pelinna: 2 (R 432) Phacium: 1 (R 444) Pharsalus: 1 (R 505) Elea, Epirus: 1 (BMC 6, over Philip II) Pyrrhus: 2 (BMC 40) Disposition: unknown Information from Seyrig
